title: requirement to join ranked
body:
why is there no requirements to join ranked games? it seems a little stupid to have people who know nothing about the game playing in the ranked games, rek sai supp 2 kills 14 deaths 2 assists excessive abuse - sivir ADC with ONLY attack speed - Top AFK heimerdinger because that was the easiest way to get money without feeding them, these are just a few of the stupid things we see, maybe there should be a requirement that u play every champ at least 3 times or have a certain percentage of the champions owned

i honestly dont believe most people deliberately feed although some do and just enjoy being douchebags but between having no tribunal and no requirements for ranked its hard to get anywhere in this game, regardless of your argument there is no tribunal that i can see and until it becomes available the problems will persist.

im not saying im a great player as i know im average but 90% of my promo's have been lost due to people doing down right stupid shyt.
1 of the major issues is this lolking and lolnexus system that shows people who are in promo's and in many cases people delibratly feed just to make them loose there promo

i can sometimes carry a team to victory with positive words of wisdom but its rare since people just trash talk knowing there is no consequence for it

(edited for spelling corrections)

replies.body:
You are jungling braum and are complaining about people going rek'sai support? Duuuuuudee.... 
**People are free to play off meta champions and build whatever the ♥♥♥♥ they want. No method of testing to reach a certain 'ranked requirement' is ever going to stop that. **

Your kda is absolute ♥♥♥♥ in most of your games, some could even argue that you are the feeder. 
Yeah, I understand that once the enemy team is fed from your allies they start roaming and killing you repetitively and as a result kda drops significantly.

 Still, this isn't really an excuse. You have to keep asking yourself if you could have positioned better or warded more (you ward a lot though, good job).  I would also check your item builds (it will help you get the kills more easily), modify them to complement the natural powerspikes of the champ you are plays (BoRK does not suit every champion and in many of the match ups you built it into, there would have been more suitable choices)

> why is there no requirements to join ranked games?

Guess that means you don't have to be level 30 *or* own 16 champs then. Oh wait, I CAN'T F*CKING PLAY RANKED WITH THIS ACCOUNT!!!

There are requirements, but there's not really a way for Riot to have requirements focused on skill.

win 500 norms then play ranked
that would b good because people in ranked SUCK
That is waaaayyyy to much effort

Because you don't need to be "good" to play ranked, just be level 30 and own 16 champions.

Unlucky if you get those people, but that's what Bronze is for, to cage those people and keep them away from people who learn the game LOL

i always thought like a "summoners licence" thing could be done, like a very short (10 question) multiple choice quizz thats asks you the basics. I don't think normals wins or anything like that matters. You can see the people in Bronze 5 with 15K ranked games played shows the number of games means very little.
nah just scream at them and call them a noob, make their ranked experience hell so they never play the game again, or you could get gold and never have to deal with it again you self righteous di*k
